website_summaries.verdict: The whisk-style brush on this handy little dustpan works well and lasts.
pros: A heavy-duty set for the price
It will pick up quick kitchen messes and can also help with heavier projects
Broom snaps into the dust pan for compact storage
cons: The pan is a little narrower than others on the market, but matches well with the size of this brush

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy about it
customer_reviews.text: I found this product ok. I did read the reviews and I can see where people would like this for cat litter. I have tile and am using this for everyday dirt with a two year old and Im not crazy about it. Its sturdy and well made, the bristles are tight and sturdy on the broom, yes it fits nicely together for storage, but unlike previous reviews I wish it had the rubber strip. The hard plastic doesn't seal well to my floors and I end up sweeping multiple times to get it all in the dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Small Gripes= Big Differences in Quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple dust pan for the house, especially to clean up cat litter that my kitty tracks in the hallway. This Libman model is light and easy to use, but my only gripe is that it is not angled in the corners and it is difficult to get in those hard to reach places. Additionally, the dustpan itself doesn't have a rubber stopper on the bottom edge, so you have to hold it in order to scoop everything in it or else the dustpan will move.
customer_reviews.author: FelineFriendly

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Litter Wonder
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised by how well this dustpan works on kitty litter. Its the dustpan itself more than the brush but very good brush with just the right flex. If your current pan has a rubber edge it won't do the job like this little dust pan. No ribber edge is the key. All the litter granules get swept right up into this pan scoop. If kitty litter is your problem this is your answer. All those pebbles, Gone.
customer_reviews.author: Rjay

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: My previous dustpan was a brand I’m rarely disappointed in but it has a thick edge on it that made sweeping small debris into the pan nearly impossible. This dustpan has a very fine edge that works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Goodneighbor

customer_reviews.title: Thinner plastic, not as sturdy as older model
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a dustpanset that was used to sweep cat litter. As the last cat is in her final repose (RIP) I threw out the other one and ordered this one. This new dustpan set is a thinner plastic than my previous Libman set (I actually didn't notice it was the same brand until I received the new one, just wanted the same style) and while it works well it arrived with a broken handle (the loop at the top). I don't hang it up so I just fixed it with duct tape and am using it. It works fine, just not as sturdy as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: SCGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdily built like my last Libman.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy or good as my last Libman Dust Pan and Broom! Not as sturdy and plastic on dust pan thin. Doesn’t have a good flat edge to catch all the litter from my cat box like the last one did. Not bad for the low cost, though.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Page

customer_reviews.title: Affordable AND it works
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I purchased it for all of the litter my cat manages to kick out of her box. There's no rubber lip, so it's easy to get everything INTO the pan, rather than under it. The two pieces snap together and are a great size. I'm always hesitant buying something inexpensive, but I am very glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: ericaamy

customer_reviews.title: Great Whisk Broom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our new tear drop camper. I like the broom, it is very stiff and strong, but the plastic dust pan that came with it was warped on the long edge so whatever I try to sweep into goes underneath! I try to push the warp down but that is hard to do and sweep at the same time. Just a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: nerak1051

customer_reviews.title: great brush, crappy tray
customer_reviews.text: The part of tray that touches the ground isn't flat/straight. When you press down to make the center touch with the handle, it actually bows up even more. Will heat it up some and try to reform it but not too optimistic. So, will likely buy a metal tray and use the brush with it.
customer_reviews.author: dmsbuy

customer_reviews.title: Small dust pans for a busy artist
customer_reviews.text: I can make a mess in every room. I will end up with one of these in every room. My gorgeous little dog sheds like a big dog, crafting is very messy, cooking is even messier. These little pans and brushes save the back to get up little things without the big vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, now I like it
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, now I like it. Not too long after getting it, the dust pan cracked at the side. I was able to tape it with gorilla tape, and it worked~. But, this is a great dust pan and especially the brush. The bristles are actually hard and will sweet up even on carpet. Most brushes are soft and flimsy, but not this one. I do recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Hemo

customer_reviews.title: Nice dutpan and brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dustpan and brush to use for the fuzzies and small pieces of material I get on my table as I lay out my quilt. You can always count on Libman products. They are attractive and well made. This is exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: We wanted the kids to start helping out with the chores and found that a long broom stick wasn't very good for little hands. Got this, and boom, little helpers are doing such a great job sweeping up the messes. It's very comfortable in their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Marina G

customer_reviews.title: Flat edge
customer_reviews.text: What can one say about a dustpan? The edge is flast and easy to sweep trash into. Wish it had a long handle on the pan so that i didn't have to bend over.
customer_reviews.author: Joan E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bedroom clean-up use
customer_reviews.text: Great for small pickup of dust and other garbage. When not in use brush fits into dustpan for easy storing. Love the red color too. And as usual Amazon delivers very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: William Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great little hand broom set
customer_reviews.text: Really like the stiffness of the bristles on this brush. Bought it for my kids who like to help sweep up, but I frequently find myself grabbing it for quick cleanups in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: broktreeVT

customer_reviews.title: Total waste
customer_reviews.text: Where dustpan is supposed to lay flat, it curves up, and if I apply pressure down to try to push it flat so debris can be swept into it, it actually curves more, increasing the gap between edge and floor. Junked immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Nice little whisk broom and dust pan!!
customer_reviews.text: Great solid little unit that is well built with heavy plastic and strong bristles. Perfect for litter box area or other little cleanups. Broom part snaps into dust pan for easy storage. I thought the price was a great deal for what you get. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Best dust pan and whisk broom set, ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best dust pan and whisk broom set, ever! Seldom am I compelled to write reviews, but this set whisk broom and pan set is rally great. The pan has no sharp edges, it's made out of a fairly dust-shedding material, it's a nice weight, and the leading edge is very good - flat, sharp. The whisk broom is very good not only on linoleum and hardwood, but also short shag or berber carpet in the home or cars.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Dew

customer_reviews.title: S
customer_reviews.text: I should have just got a regular sized broom. It’s a pain in the ass to sweep with this. I thought it would be cool because i live in an apartment and i have all carpet besides my kitchen but honestly I’m better off without this.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good but for one minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: Ok I do like this it works well and I use it mostly for litter my ONLY complaint is the ridge is too close to the edge and you have to really put force into getting things in and repeat. I have found when the ridge is a little further in it makes it easier and you sweep "in" the pan less times. Hope that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Durable and convenient broom set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, durable and easy to use set. I recommend it. Works well in tight places and sweeps up fine dust.
customer_reviews.author: Bret barnard

customer_reviews.title: Too small, awkward brush
customer_reviews.text: How can this be the most highly rated dustpan on Amazon? It’s tiny, cheap, and the paintbrush style brush is awkward to use. The crumbs are hard to actually get onto the pan because of the way it’s designed. What a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Bronte "Pen"

customer_reviews.title: household necessity
customer_reviews.text: Brush is great (bristles are firm enough to sweep most anything) and this is a very nice dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moss

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Everyone can use a whisk broom/dust pan. We take it in the RV, easy to store under the sink.
customer_reviews.author: LKP

customer_reviews.title: Sweeps up well. Good bristles.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and does the job well. I was looking for a dust pan that doesn't suck so I can sweep up kitty litter. Some dust pans were $20+ and they look like complete pieces of junk. The only thing this combo is missing is a rubber lip to the pan. Other than that, this is a great value
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Stoops

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for small spills or small area. Old school but much easier than a broom or vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian2314

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: just the right size for quick spill clean-ups. effective brush. sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The product is great quality but only good for tiny
customer_reviews.text: The product is great quality but only good for tiny, minuscule messes. Not great for kids to use to sweep up the bedding around guinea pigs' cages.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Larger than the standard and much better made than the Wal-mart brand. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting edge is perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: nice product. 3rd or 4th time purchasing. They keep disappearing into all corners of the house after hubby uses them. Love that the edge does not disintegrate after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: MEPchll

customer_reviews.title: The dust pan isn't flat, so you sweep crumbs ...
customer_reviews.text: The dust pan isn't flat, so you sweep crumbs right under the middle of it. Whoops. It is not working for what I intended. (Having my 5 year old help sweep up the kitchen floor)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Messenger

customer_reviews.title: This whisk broom set deserves 6 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a good whisk broom & the feedback on this set was exceptional. They came today & I couldn't be more pleased! Sturdy & smart looking as well as well as moderately priced. Ms Libman's products have proven top of the line (I have several) & good to see she is again living up to her reputation!
customer_reviews.author: R. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and it is great for quick clean ups.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Fake reviews? This thing sucks
customer_reviews.text: The bottom edge isn't flush with the floor - it bows so all the dirt just gets pushed around. The only way to get it flush is t push with your finger - gross. The brush bristles are weak also. Don't understand the high reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Not too big, not too small, just right! It's not a mini-dustpan, but it's also not a big dustpan - it's just the size I was looking for. The front edge of the dustpan measures 10". It lets me sweep up the dust/grass/dirt easily even though the edge is pretty solid. I'm glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Connexus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to place
customer_reviews.text: You can place it anywhere in a home and wint take up important space.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Store
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, easy to use, snaps together for storage. Doesn't stick as much as others brooms to the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Handy for quick sweeps, fireplace ashes, around cat feeding station....only problem, it keeps ending up in the garage...can't imagine how.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a set where the brush stays in the pan as it should. Compact size just right for my tiny apartment.
customer_reviews.author: hcn

customer_reviews.title: Pan + Broom = Great!
customer_reviews.text: Well made (American I am told!) Nice broom with splintered broom. Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: F. Becht

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item - Bristles not very flexible
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting the bristles to be as stiff as these are. I have a smaller (from different company) one and it is much more flexible. Good quality but not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable.
customer_reviews.text: Seems solid and sturdy. A little more than I was planning to spend but wanted something that would last quite a while. Here's hoping!
customer_reviews.author: Garnetta Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little bigger but lives up to the Libman name.
customer_reviews.author: Eleganza Baton Rouge, LA

customer_reviews.title: Great Little broom
customer_reviews.text: We use these a lot at the shelter and they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I find softer bristles pick up dust better. I have sprayed the bristles with an anti-static ...
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are rather stiff. I find softer bristles pick up dust better. I have sprayed the bristles with an anti-static product which seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect little brooms for having by the woodstove. We also put one in our sauna. I love that the broom and dust pan attach to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Middle man size
customer_reviews.text: It's not small enough to feel right packing it camping. I'm giving it 5 because duh I can get a ruler out and see the size they said it would be. But it's made extremely well as all have said. Just why would I not grab my broom? This is kinda compact like if you have a craft room or table you need swept great. Not good for camping if you pack light and small. But great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great broom set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these sets for all my family. BIG HIT!
customer_reviews.author: Roxane Keeney

customer_reviews.title: It's good it works just great for picking up small messes
customer_reviews.text: It's good it works just great for picking up small messes, the pan meets the floor tightly and the two parts clip together so I can store them easily. No problems here.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Pope

customer_reviews.title: What is not to love!? I have a similar full size broom
customer_reviews.text: What is not to love!? I have a similar full size broom. Love the ease of being able to brush out my car rugs or do simple clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hiebert

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small jobs. My dog is a messy eater. I use this to clean up my kitchen floor after he eats.... once I gather the crumbs with this, I can easily Swiffer wet jet.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Because it doesn't have a lip at the edge of the pan, it collects debris easily. Also like the top handle on the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little dust pan
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how important it was to forego the rubber lips that some pans have. They actually make it harder to get everything into the pain. This is a quality little dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Dex85

customer_reviews.title: Just A Little Broom and Pan
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. Seems to hold up fine. I use mine pretty often for cleaning up bird seed scatter from porch feeder.
customer_reviews.author: ucme4me

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dust pan & whisk broom for work. The cleaning people don't clean under our desks as often as we'd like. Compact & sturdy. Just what I wanted at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: robb quick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for sweeping the floor in my camper van.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy practical trash pickup
customer_reviews.text: Handy quick pickup which will not show dirt and coordinate with the reds in my kitchen colors
customer_reviews.author: Forest

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpesive and small. Just what I was looking for. It will crack or chip if dropped from too high, but I didn't buy a $30 metal dustpan
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and it lets me do the cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Misbee -

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I use this to pick up excess shredding as I empty the container. It works well for me. Could be just a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Work Bench Tidy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dust pan and whisk to keep the work bench Ares clean. It works. A nice feature is that it easily hangs on my peg board.
customer_reviews.author: Deacon42

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to be very convenient/near kitty litter box for quick clean up around the box. Perfect for this.
customer_reviews.author: Unbiased Independent Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Small job wonder!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to sweep up cat liter kicked out of the liter box
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as advertised; would definitely buy from seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn D. Van Der Linden

customer_reviews.title: Sits on top of my cat's litter box...
customer_reviews.text: The short, stiff bristles make it excellent for sweeping up cat litter. I bought it just for this purpose and it does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, works great. I have 3 around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Cheetah

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA a plus
customer_reviews.text: They fit together so nicely I never have to look for the pan or the brush. I like the color it makes it easy to find. Good buy , also made in USA a plus.
customer_reviews.author: jef

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A little big for my intended use (got it for my little one who wants to help around the house), but it's well made, and definitely a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kacidee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean up messes around my bird cage, and I love it! Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Bungee

customer_reviews.title: they are the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Libman broom and dustpan. So far, they are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Red Whisk
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but it is red and shinny I don't know how to not like it. I can't wait to use it when I go camping next Summer. Bristles are firm enough, so I think it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Just Yes.
customer_reviews.text: The mother of all dustpans now can be yours. I know you've had your share of plastic dustpans... but the beveled edge on this baby will "knock 'dem socks clean off" due to the fact that "dat dirt aint got no where leff to go cuz dis thing got so many bristles" as my elderly black maid tells me. You can thank her for this review; I just pay her handsomely.
customer_reviews.author: Dana007T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect duo for quick cleanups in the car. With the usual straw whisk brooms like we've all used in the past, you have to struggle getting the dirt picked up when you get to the edges of the floor and the step. The softer bristles also do a better job of sweeping dirt than did the traditional straw brooms. I'm very happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lss4Him

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: Pros: right size to clean up area around wood stove, red color is nice so it is always easy to find Cons: dust pan doesn’t lay flat.. slight U shape which is not desirable in a dust pan.. Plain plastic edge with no rubber etc so dust has to leap over gap ..rather a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: R. Froode

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Have you noticed how cheaply made everything is these days? I was pleasantly surprised by this heavy-duty little whisk-broom and dust-pan set. It's such a small thing to notice and appreciate, but it's little things like this that can make your life better. It's a solid little set. The broom is stiff without being too stiff. It's a nice weight, and the handle feels good in your hand. (No scraggly pieces on the molded plastic.) Someone took their time to design this. The broom snaps neatly and securely into the dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WHISK BROOM & DUST PAN
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Libman products. I had been using an old straw whisk broom which was on it's last legs. Decided to get this whisk broom and dust pan. Love them both plus you can hang it up. Thanks for a great product and price.
customer_reviews.author: carrera4

customer_reviews.title: Not flimsy like some are claiming
customer_reviews.text: its a solid brush, exactly what you'd think from the product description. some folks claiming its flimsy, I can certainly say that is not the case, just a normal solid plastic brush, not flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Gide

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance dust pan and broom
customer_reviews.text: I love this dust pan and broom set. The brush is hard and sturdy and the dust pan is sturdy. Great value for the money. Also like that the dust broom locks into the dust pan so u will always have them handy together
customer_reviews.author: gail calabro

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for cat litter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for sweeping up the cat litter on the floor. Because litter is so small, not having a rubber piece on the pan makes a big difference. Also the broom bristles are thick and I'm not catching a lot. You end up sweeping it more times than you need to. Again, no rubber piece is the breaker here. I'm returning it. But on another note, it's not a bad product. It's meant for larger items to sweep. Not cat litter.
customer_reviews.author: L Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great camping tool
customer_reviews.text: This product works just as it should. I took it on my family reunion camping trip and everyone loved using it. My husband said it worked great when he swept of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Simonitch

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great dustpan to sweep up litter. It's durable & ergonomic. Made in the USA too, which is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Welker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for Camping and Travel Trailers/RV's
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for a year for camping and use inside our travel trailer and just ordered one more. The bristles are very good and sturdy. The 7" width of the broom seems perfect for camping. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping
customer_reviews.text: For the money you cannot beat it. Small enough for storage in tent but sturdy enough for cleaning
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Very handy tool
customer_reviews.text: I use it often to clean up my work shop and the floors of my car. Really convenient to have this hanging in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Good size and good stiffness on both the pan and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good size and good stiffness on both the pan and the brush. We have three dustpans, and this is our go-to for in the house. It does a decent job with both fine and bigger stuff.
customer_reviews.author: G.P.R.

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You See.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective. I keep one in each bathroom and bedroom. Why run from one place to another just to get a scooper?
customer_reviews.author: VeloMac

customer_reviews.title: good seal on floor
customer_reviews.text: Good seal on floor. Better than my others with a soft strip of another material. They drive me nuts when the dirt scoots under the pan. This one is much better. Small size is good.
customer_reviews.author: book crone

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for the garage.
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. Very sturdy and it gets the small jobs done perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Riddlin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my kitchen. It works very well. The bristles are stiff and fabulous. The dust pan is great. All the debris go in with no problem. I am really glad I have this for my kitchen. I spill stuff all the time and this is very useful for cleaning up.
customer_reviews.author: B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Handy whisk broom & dust pan.
customer_reviews.text: Makes cleaning up around me wood heating stove easy. Attractive enough to be kept in sight. Have found it very helpful each day I use firewood.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lay

customer_reviews.title: simiple and useful
customer_reviews.text: Small compact dust pan and brush that we use to pick up stuff around the kitchen. Have it hanging behind a base cabeinet door for easy access. Not much to it - it's a pan that you sweep dust into - but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: ccpff

customer_reviews.title: While they sweep up the finer particles, they also collect all the dust which ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not crazy about the very soft bristles. While they sweep up the finer particles, they also collect all the dust which you have to pick out of the brush. I guess there is no perfect answer to a whisk broom except getting the vacuum out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: super, we needed a small sweeper for a small ...
customer_reviews.text: super, we needed a small sweeper for a small area where the kitty litter box is. it's great at picking up small pieces. brush fits snugly and securely in the handle.. love RED perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny B

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It's a whisk broom and dustpan that does what it's supposed to do. Has worked effectively and is nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dust pan and whisk broom set!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't stand my old cheap dust pan and whisk broom set any longer. I "upgraded" for only $7! It was definitely worth it. It's large enough to get the job done but small and thin enough to store easily. The whisk broom fits snugly into the dust pan handle. Couldn't ask for better!
customer_reviews.author: KDM22

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little dustpan & broom! It does not leave the trail of dirt that you have to continuously sweep, like most dustpans.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Libman products are always top of the line ...
customer_reviews.text: Libman always makes a sound cleaning tool. I appreciate that this set is not the traditional "white" which shows dirt. I thnk they soould consider using more red in their entire line ... the green is getting a little tired.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Considine

customer_reviews.title: good price. convenient sized broom and dust pan
customer_reviews.text: good price. convenient sized broom and dust pan. easy to store. i use it to sweep up litter that has escaped from my cat's box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sweeping up debris under the huge cage of my two pet rats. Also great for "sweeping" the bars and floors when I clean the cage. Very sturdy and easily stored on shelf under cage.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

product_meta.title: Libman 906 Dust Pan with Whisk Broom
product_meta.description: Heavy-Duty, super-durable polypropelyne construction is what allows the Libman Household Dustpan to stand out among the rest when collecting dirt and debris. The oversized, deep well holds more dirt and accepts all standard sized brooms to make this dustpan the perfect combo to the Libman Whisk Broom. The Whisk Broom features 7" of sweeping space, and split tip fibers made from recycled water bottles. Excellent for quick pick-ups, the Libman Whisk Broom has more durability, and a longer life than your traditional whisk broom.
feature_bullets: Whisk Broom snaps into a Libman dustpan for easy and convenient storage
The fine fibers help to better pick up hair, dust, and dirt better than traditional small-job brooms
The sturdy, flagged duster fibers are made from recycled materials in environmentally friendly manufacturing facilities
10.5" total whisk height with a 7" wide sweeping surface. Comes with a 10.25" wide dustpan
Quality made in the USA since 1896
